I just opened up the first file (Volume 1, Chapter 1) and it's a manga from Korea set in the present day.  It isn't a movie at all.  I hesitated opening it right away because my computer is not cooperating with video files lately and I've got stuff on my desktop I wasn't ready to put to bed, but didn't want to have to save.  Too curious, so I took the chance it wouldn't freeze everything up.  What a surprise to find jpgs.  :-)
 
Wounds, your heart was exactly in the right place.  It just wasn't cooperating and tried to fool you.  :-D  Thanks for trying.  And thanks for the hints for identifying the film, Kevin.
 
phil

Kevin Closson <k_closson2001@...> wrote:
I didn't get a chance to look since it isn't there
anymore, but the easy way to tell if if Toshiro Mifune
pops out of nowhere or it says directed by Okamoto. :)
Either way, don't worry because you are going to get
it soon whether you like it or not anyways. ;)

Wierd how these coincidences happen if it is. 

Kevin
